allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update research interests order, add abstracts, PICP award, and links

- Swap Civil Society before Aid in research interests keywords
- Split bio sentence at "I manage" for cleaner flow
- Add real abstracts for all 4 Under Review papers
- Add Program in Comparative Politics Graduate Research Award to fellowships
- Link Sudan corridors article to RIPIL blog post
- Link Cyanne E. Loyle to her academic website

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove redundant PhD line from bio, split PSU awards into University/College vs Department

- Remove "I am a Dual Title Ph.D. Student at Penn State" from bio \(already in subtitle\)
- Split Penn State awards into University/College and Department sections matching CV structure

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
